comments:
Description:
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.script.internal.ScriptExecutor.getInstance(element) doesn't process null argument.

Steps to reproduce:
Using ReportRunner to run attached file.

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.script.internal.ScriptExecutor.getInstance(ScriptExecutor.java:83)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.script.internal.CellScriptExecutor.handleOnRender(CellScriptExecutor.java:81)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.LocalizedEmitter.startCell(LocalizedEmitter.java:284)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.GridItemExecutor.executeCell(GridItemExecutor.java:286)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.GridItemExecutor.executeRow(GridItemExecutor.java:229)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.GridItemExecutor.execute(GridItemExecutor.java:144)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutorVisitor.visitGridItem(ReportExecutorVisitor.java:172)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.ir.GridItemDesign.accept(GridItemDesign.java:117)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.GridItemExecutor.executeCell(GridItemExecutor.java:294)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.GridItemExecutor.executeRow(GridItemExecutor.java:229)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.GridItemExecutor.execute(GridItemExecutor.java:144)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutorVisitor.visitGridItem(ReportExecutorVisitor.java:172)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.ir.GridItemDesign.accept(GridItemDesign.java:117)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutor.execute(ReportExecutor.java:121)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutor.execute(ReportExecutor.java:87)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run(RunAndRenderTask.java:148)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.runAndRenderReport(ReportRunner.java:232)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.execute(ReportRunner.java:158)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.main(ReportRunner.java:129)
